SELECT B.NO AS BACK_NO , B.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , P.TITLE AS PROJECT_TITLE , P.NO AS PROJECT_NO , TO_CHAR(P.START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS END_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.CAL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS CAL_DATE , PS.STATUS , R.NAME AS REWARD_NAME , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(R.AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS "REWARD_AMOUNT" , TO_CHAR(B.BACKING_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS BACKING_DATE , B.RETRACT_YN AS BACK_RETRACT_YN , PS.PAYMENT_STATUS , PT.PAYMENT_TYPE FROM BACKER B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN PROJECT P ON B.PROJECT_NO = P.NO JOIN PROJECT_STATUS PS ON P.STATUS_NO = PS.NO JOIN REWARD R ON B.REWARD_NO = R.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT PM ON PM.BACKER_NO = B.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_STATUS PS ON PM.PAYMENT_STATUS_NO = PS.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_TYPE PT ON PM.PAYMENT_TYPE_NO = PT.NO
P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{projectTitle} || '%'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%' || #{memberName} || '%'
AND B.BACKING_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{termStart},'YYYY.MM.DD')
AND B.BACKING_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{termEnd},'YYYY.MM.DD')
ORDER BY B.BACKING_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(B.NO) FROM BACKER B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN PROJECT P ON B.PROJECT_NO = P.NO JOIN PROJECT_STATUS PS ON P.STATUS_NO = PS.NO JOIN REWARD R ON B.REWARD_NO = R.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT PM ON PM.BACKER_NO = B.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_STATUS PS ON PM.PAYMENT_STATUS_NO = PS.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_TYPE PT ON PM.PAYMENT_TYPE_NO = PT.NO
P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{projectTitle} || '%'
AND M.NAME LIKE '%' || #{memberName} || '%'
AND B.BACKING_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{termStart},'YYYY.MM.DD')
AND B.BACKING_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{termEnd},'YYYY.MM.DD')

SELECT B.NO AS BACK_NO , B.MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , P.TITLE AS PROJECT_TITLE , P.NO AS PROJECT_NO , TO_CHAR(P.START_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.END_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS END_DATE , TO_CHAR(P.CAL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS CAL_DATE , PS.STATUS , R.NAME AS REWARD_NAME , REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REVERSE(TO_CHAR(R.AMOUNT)), '(\d{3})', '\1,')), '^,', '') AS "REWARD_AMOUNT" , TO_CHAR(B.BACKING_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS BACKING_DATE , PS.PAYMENT_STATUS , PT.PAYMENT_TYPE FROM BACKER B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN PROJECT P ON B.PROJECT_NO = P.NO JOIN PROJECT_STATUS PS ON P.STATUS_NO = PS.NO JOIN REWARD R ON B.REWARD_NO = R.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT PM ON PM.BACKER_NO = B.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_STATUS PS ON PM.PAYMENT_STATUS_NO = PS.NO LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_TYPE PT ON PM.PAYMENT_TYPE_NO = PT.NO WHERE B.NO = #{backNo}
